website_summaries.verdict: In addition to making hair look thick and full for most consumers that try, this multi-purpose shampoo also volumizes hair by removing buildup that can weigh it down.
pros: Removes buildup caused by styling products and thickens thin, fine hair without feeling heavy
Works well for almost any type of hair, including curly and color treated
cons: Pump has been reported to stop working
Some bottles leaked by the time they arrived

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I use all of the Kenra products but just tried this new shampoo. It does make my hair look and feel thicker! I have very fine hair and this works great!
customer_reviews.author: P. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Not so great for me.
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about this conditioner. I have fine hair and this made my hair almost impossible to get the tangles out after I used it. It seems like I took out so much of my hair unknotting after using the conditioner... not buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Ruddell

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shampoo. It works well on my color treated hair. I've purchased it several times and love that it comes in this large size. Kenra makes good hair products! Also, smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Mccann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Kenra Platinum Thickening Shampoo and Conditioner are the best products I've ever used on my hair. My hair is fine, thin, naturally curly, and somewhat dry and this combo leaves my hair feeling full and wonderful. The products are pricey but worth every penny. I will continue to purchase through Amazon with their great prices!
customer_reviews.author: CallMePicky

customer_reviews.title: Not Really Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have really fine hair. Not thin but just flat and fine. I was recommended this shampoo to really make my hair feel full. I would've expected more from the brand Kenra. I've been using the shampoo now for almost two months and don't really see any change. Maybe its just my hair type? Idk but I just don't really see spending this much for really no change at all.
customer_reviews.author: JoLynn

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I have fine thin hair ~ and is becoming thinner with age. I can honestly say I don’t notice much of a difference in the thickness of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Cbrn

customer_reviews.title: Pump does not work
customer_reviews.text: I might like this product; however, I am unable to get the pump to work. It appears to be the same pump that is used for this same size Kenra Shampoo which works. I would like to obtain a pump that works. Do I need to return the entire product?
customer_reviews.author: Lori J from Estero

customer_reviews.title: Bottle won't open
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all of the suggested things to get the spout to open and it just won't. Really unhappy with this product before I even get to use it. Very large bottle and not interested in having to take the pump out of the bottle and pour to use it. Probably will sit in the closet and I won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Not super moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this originally from Ulta. Not super moisturizing but does not weigh down fine hair. Bottle I purchased on Amazon seemed a little old because the consistency is so thick. I have been mixing this batch with a little water. I probably will buy a different conditioner when I finish this bottle. This conditioner does have a pretty scent.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair and thin. Adds a lot of volumn. Even my hairdresser noticed the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo-it really does seem to thicken my thinning hair!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and price.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality of the product and how it cleans and conditions my hair without leaving a heavy residue.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware unreliable company

customer_reviews.author: New Englander1

customer_reviews.title: made my hair fall out
customer_reviews.text: Tried this brand after reading on a different site it was good for fine/thinning hair. Unfortunately it made my hair fall out. The first couple weeks were okay. I did have increased volume and was very happy but then I noticed I was experiencing more hair loss than normal. Had to go order a different brand to try. Would not recommend for anyone with thinning hair.
customer_reviews.author: Dsturbedbutterfly

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the new price they've changed to, better options out there for half the price!
customer_reviews.text: This used to be under $20 for the 3.5 ounce bottle. They have crept the price up little by little and now it's more than double at $42. Same product, same size, double the price. There are better thickening conditioners for $25.
customer_reviews.author: Tim W

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. It really works! I gave it 4 stars because the pump on the bottle is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Hammons

customer_reviews.title: Kenra Thickening Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is the only hair product line I use, and this is the best place I've found to purchase the larger size for a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: JarheadzMom05

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product that works!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is amazing! It really helped my hair to have lots o body. It even made a difference after I went swimming. My hair was the best I had ever seen after my swim too. Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste B. Hawks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Kenra Platinum Thickening Shampoo and Conditioner are the best products I've ever used on my hair. customer_reviews.author: CallMePicky

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, pump is impossible
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product twice now and both times the pump would not open on the bottle. I tried to contact Amazon about a replacement pump, but that is also impossible. In the future, I will purchase from local store and probably pay more, but I will have a pump that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing, Creates Volume, Doesn't weigh down the hair.
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizing without weighing down. Volume is noticeable without drying out. I have super fine long hair that tends to run towards oily so this was nice to find.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered Shampoo but got the Conditioner. Otherwise, I love this product!

customer_reviews.title: Great conditioner!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: A BIG Mess. Disappointed!!

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed

customer_reviews.title: Great product but terrible condition in box. Bottle was open.
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I gave 4 stars (I LOVE this product) is because the bottle was open and it leaked everywhere.

customer_reviews.title: Awful packaging.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!  TRy for more body with the Thickening Mousse!

customer_reviews.title: Great volume!!

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I use with the Platinum Thickening Shampoo. Quality product. Improved the texture and shine of my hair.

customer_reviews.title: High quality product.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as it was recommended by a friend. I love it.

customer_reviews.title: light not heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. My hair is in great condition and handles wonderfully.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sent of it is nice and I haven't experienced any negative while using but something seems off.

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and leaves hair feeling weightless and full of volume

customer_reviews.title: How old is this product?
customer_reviews.text: I wonder if this product is really old as it is SUPER thick. I only end up using half to a quarter pump at a time otherwise my hair gets really greasy by the end of the day. It doesn't weigh my hair down at all and the smell is great. I just feel "okay" about this product.. mostly because I do think it's old and too thick.

customer_reviews.title: Bad push spout

customer_reviews.title: Easy hair care super soft
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stuff. I wash my hair then put in the creme rinse and I am done with that part of my shower! My hair is so soft!!!

customer_reviews.title: Save your money

customer_reviews.title: One piece of clear packing tape over the top is not sufficient
